channel.title: Making KBD A safe zone [317 Delta]
channel.description: How do I make the KBD cave a safe zone?

item.title: Making KBD A safe zone [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I don’t have that boolean.

item.title: Making KBD A safe zone [317 Delta]
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:4, topic:367831”]Search for: public boolean nonWild() {

and under that add:

|| (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

In the first absX and the absY is the very South-West part of your safe area. the second absX and the absY are the very North-East part of what you want safe. So put in the coordinates for the KBD lair ;)[/quote]

nah in delta i believe they only have wild zones only
and czars has nonwild

Read full topic
item.source: Making KBD A safe zone [317 Delta]

item.title: Making KBD A safe zone [317 Delta]

item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Search for: public boolean nonWild() {

and under that add:

|| (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

In the first absX and the absY is the very South-West part of your safe area. the second absX and the absY are the very North-East part of what you want safe. So put in the coordinates for the KBD lair
